0110100101000101 1010001001110001 1 -> sum: 0000101110110111, cout: 1
0011001011001010 0101110010110010 1 -> sum: 1000111101111101, cout: 0
1011001000100110 1011001100110011 0 -> sum: 0110010101011001, cout: 1
0001000101001001 0110100101100000 0 -> sum: 0111101010101001, cout: 0
0110011001010111 0011111100100011 1 -> sum: 1010010101111011, cout: 0
0011000111010001 0010010101110000 1 -> sum: 0101011101000010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
